list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a country or area under the full or partial political control of another country, typically a distant one, and occupied by settlers from that country.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Japanese forces overran the French colony of Indo-China
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lực lượng Nhật Bản tràn ngập thuộc địa Pháp của Indo-Trung Quốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group of people of one nationality or ethnic group living in a foreign city or country.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the British colony in New York
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thuộc địa Anh ở New York

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a community of animals or plants of one kind living close together or forming a physically connected structure.
